title: Couch Cover for Dogs Washable, Calming Dog Bed Mats, Non Slip Pet Bed for Couch, Fluffy Cat Mat for Furniture Protector Sofa Cover for Home and Car (Dark-Grey, 33.4 * 30.7inch)
description: Dog Couch Bed Washable Product Description Specification: Name: fluffy fuzzy calming dog bed sofa protector pet mat Main material: Facecloth fabrics Filling: PP cotton Applicable functions: sofa cushions, floor cushions, bay window cushions, bedside cushions, pet cushions Easy Maintenance: Fully machine-washable for a clean and hygienic environment, simplifying care and maintenance for pet owners.  Package Contains: 1 Pcs X Couch Cover Product Size: (Please be sure to measure the size of your own sofa cushion, and make sure that the size range of this sofa cover is suitable for your sofa before purchasing.) 70*65cm/27.5*25.5inch 85*78cm/33.4*30.7inch 100*85cm/39.3*33.4inch 120*95cm/47.2*37.4inch Notes: 1.Due to different manual measurements, please allow for slight size differences. 2.Due to differences in different monitors, the picture may not reflect the actual color of the item. 3.The product is compressed packaging, after decompression will be a little flat at first, the product will gradually become fluffy within 24 hours after opening the package
